description.text: this message file contains messages for [name] package

msg.text: Because of ICF setting, no region is assigned for any partition.\n
Cannot place $$s comp in a $$s site.
Error random locating floating heterogeneous PGROUP $$s.
Unable to anchor floating heterogeneous PGROUP $$s.\n
Macro: $$s is sharing $$d arcs with another macro.\n
Macro: $$s is sharing $$d nodes with another macro.\n
PGROUP $$s placement will not change because comp $$s cannot be moved.
Placement timing preferences are hard to meet. However, placement will continue. Use static timing analysis to identify errors.
Placement timing preferences are hard to meet. Placement will not be done. Use static timing analysis to identify errors.
Placer encountered locate pref for currently unplaced comp.\n Ignoring pref: $$s
Placer encountered locate pref for comp placed somewhere else.\n Ignoring pref: $$s
Placer encountered lock pref for currently unplaced comp.\n Ignoring pref: $$s
There were not enough sites to place all of the selected components.
